name: Grand Exchange > Buying > Equipment
description: Create a preceeding "if never fired before" to add all gear to GEAR_LIST that should be bought. Followed by a GEAR_CHECK variable to pull each off the list. Also, don't create a variable for "GEAR_LIST" it will auto create from "add-all"

children.customDisplayName: For each in list GEAR_LIST (First Buy)

properties.Label: If we have the item from v(GEAR_CHECK)
If we don't have the item from v(GEAR_CHECK)
